tool_description: Get summaries for YouTube in Arabic language
name: YouTube Summaries in Arabic
title: YouTube Summaries in Arabic

api_list.name: Listing videos
api_list.description: Get a list of all videos with their internal id and YouTube video id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-summaries-in-arabic.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-summaries-in-arabic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-summaries-in-arabic.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-summaries-in-arabic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a summary

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Provide the video internal id to get its summary. Note: Use either id or videoid parameter.

optional_parameters.name: videoid
optional_parameters.description: Get summary of a video using YouTube video id. Note: use only the id or videoid parameter.
